entry.title: Why Are Cities Closing Shelters If Homelessness Is Rising?
entry.content: Financial constraints, the end of Covid-19 relief funds and public pressure to revive downtowns have contributed to closures.

entry.title: Soldiers Surrender, Bases Fall and a Powerful Army No Longer Seems Invincible
entry.content: Myanmarâ€™s military is facing its biggest challenge not just since its 2021 coup but in decades and enemies of the junta are making unprecedented gains.

entry.title: Israel, Hamas Press On Despite Rising Death Tolls on Both Sides
entry.content: The Israeli military and Palestinian officials are reporting heavy losses as fighting intensifies and Israel faces pressure to wind up war.
